revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cerulean Cave |image = [[File:Cerulean Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of Cerulean Cave. |tokens = 2,500 |location = North of Cerulean City. }} '''Cerulean Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 28,735 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat || colspan=2 rowspan=15|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Parasect.png|40px]] Parasect |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Primeape.png|40px]] Primeape |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag |- | [[File:Machoke.png|40px]] Machoke |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Slowbro.png|40px]] Slowbro |- | [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton |- | [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Ditto.png|40px]] Ditto |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Sinnoh]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
